title: API Integration
description: A Python script that interacts with an external API to fetch and display data (e.g., weather, cryptocurrency prices). The app fetches data, parse it and display friendly results to the user.
objectives: Use the requests library to make GET requests to an API.
Parse and display the fetched data in a user-friendly format.
Handle errors, such as failed requests or invalid responses.
example: Examples: Weather data, cryptocurrency prices, or public datasets.
notes: This demo displays the description and objectives for Task 3. Replace this JSON later with a backend endpoint if you want the server to provide task text.
